name: C.E.O. Glow Vitamin C + Turmeric Face Oil
about: What it is:An instantly absorbing face oil infused with advanced vitamin C (THD ascorbate), turmeric, and evening primrose oil, to brighten, hydrate, and leave skin glowing..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dark Spots, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Dryness.Formulation:Lightweight Oil.Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free..What Else You Need to Know:Recharge your radiance with this glow-giving vitamin C-enriched oil. Advanced vitamin Cu0097blended in a base of cold-pressed, red raspberry and evening primrose seed oilsu0097gives your skin a fresh burst of luminosity. Golden turmeric extract is rich in antioxidants and calming compounds to improve the look of skin evenness.
ingredients: Rubus Idaeus (Cold Pressed Red Raspberry) Seed Oil, Neopentyl Glycol Diethylhexanoate, Caprylyl Caprylate/Caprate, Simmondsia Chineses (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cold Pressed Cranberry) Seed Oil, Punica Granatum (Cold Pressed Pomegranate) Seed Oil, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Seed Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Seed, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Octyldodecanol, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Oil, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Pentylene Glycol, 4-t-Butylcyclohexanol, Ribes Nigrum (Black Current) Seed Oil, Bisabolol, Cetylhydroxyproline Palmitamide, Hexyldecanol, Hydroxyphenyl Propamidobenzoic Acid, Stearic Acid, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Sterols, Cardiospermum Halicacabum Flower/ Leaf/ Vine Extract, Zingiber Officinale, Rosemarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply three to four drops into face and neck, morning and/or evening. .-Massage until absorbed, and then follow with your favorite Sunday Riley treatment or moisturizer..-Pro tip: Apply C.E.O. Glow after a retinol treatment, like A+ High-Dose Retinoid Serum.

reviews.review_text: I want to love this. I think it's actually super effective. So either I have to blot off the excess oil (which of course is a waste) or wait until it all soaks in completely (2+ hours) before applying my makeup. Imho it's too oily to just put my primer/ makeup on top, and increases slippage. So while I actually love the effects, the formulation is not super practical for me. I kept using the sample size bottle, a very generous one by the way, lasted the whole month and still have some left, and noticed very positive anti-aging benefits that were in the description of this product are true. In my case I've also noticed that the  fine lines that started appearing has diminished quite noticeably. As a result I've grown fond of the natural Ayurvedic scent of this oil and continuing applying it every night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started off loving this product, but it quickly burned my skin and now I have very textured and super dry skin as a result. Be careful - the ingredients may sound amazing but can potentially be too potent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This does help with dryness, but it doesn't absorb fully into my skin and I'm not a fan of the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail product. I've had hormonal acne and sensitive skin since going off birth control. This oil - which to me smells more like vitamin c and is not as bad as people are saying - absorbs quickly, lessens redness and makes me glow. I use it in the morning after doing the rest of my skin regime and I follow it with my gua sha and my facial roller. Does it make my dark spots and acne scars disappear over night? No, because no product actually does that. It takes time and patience and more than just vitamin c oil. Yes this product may seem pricey but I've had it for 4 months, use 3 drops on my face a morning and it looks like I've barely used the bottle. A little goes a long way and this will last a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not bad, I usually put this one after showering. The smell I personally find to be similar to some kind of tea, but not irritating or overwhelming. I find that it is quite moisturizing on my skin in the harsh Toronto winter and does make my skin look glowy but probably won't be purchasing again due to the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first introduction to this product was from a sample, and after liking the initial results -- soft skin mostly -- I bought the 15ml bottle. I bought it along with two other products from a different brand, a face wash and a face cream, and began using them at around the same time, so I can't pinpoint which product benefited me the most since.  Overall, my skin texture has improved a lot; however, the two results this serum touts are skin brightening and lightening dark spots, results I have not seen.  I still feel like my face, despite its even texture, has a dull quality, and acne marks from four or five months ago have not lightened noticeably even after using it daily for almost two months.  Maybe, I'll see better results after longer use, but I don't have the money to waste, tbh.  The purchase was a nice luxury experience, but I won't be buying it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favourite product I've gotten from Sephora. I received a sample and was hooked! I have problem skin (acne/pores). I bought the $52 bottle and I use this at night after cleansing and my pores are now less than half the size they were and my acne is almost gone. I did not expect this as it's a vitamin c oil, so happy! Going to try the clarifying oil as I'm sure it's even better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally amazing.  Smells great, feels great, got the sample and I saw a difference in my skin so I had to purchase the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The very strong scent is off-putting and lingers. Didn't notice any difference using this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love those products that give you instant noticeable results, and this is one of those products for sure. I used 3 drops on my face the first time I tried it out, and the next morning I was *glowing*. You have to be okay with the strong smell of turmeric though, or else you'll gag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's not a bad product. I didn't see too much of a difference. I didn't like the finish and the smell. I have dry skin but it didn't sit well on the surface. However the Sunday Riley Serum is by far a superior performer compared to this product. If you have trouble choosing between the two, the serum is by far the better product. It brightens and moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Decent oil, not sure I see the benefits of turmeric in the oil though. I will use this one up but I won't be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, this has changed how I feel about face oils. Like many I have been nervous with my combo skin to use an oil as I feel it would make me break out but this is fantastic! I feel hydrated but not oily and my skin is glowing. I use this morning and night with my gua sha facial tool. It's pricy but I will purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I got a small sample size and have been using it for months. I will definitely repurchase once I'm all out. There is a definite distinct smell to this product which to me just smells like turmeric, nothing unpleasant. I also find it goes away quickly. I love the instant glow this product gives me and over time really helps further along discoloration from congestion in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face oil is an underrated champion!  I have combination skin and was always scared of face oils, but when I tried this product and saw how it balanced out my oily skin, my acne and blemishes began to disappear. I've been using this product for a year now and now always use it after my weekly deep skin clean. Always get complements on my skin, I credit this products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovee this oil! I had the little sample oil, which lasted me 3 months which is shocking since I used it everyday. I got so many compliments on my skin since I started using this! I have combo skin but a little more on the dry side, but this really helped even out and brighten my skin. Going to buy the regular size and excited to see my skin glow again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Une huile tres riche, delicate et qui laisse un eclat merveilleux. Je ne suis pas fan de l'odeur, mais on passe par dessus rapidement puisque c'est tres delicat. J'adore le produit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love with this product! It gives your face a nice glow that lasts all day and doesn't make your skin look greasy. It looks really beautiful under make up or just by itself! Very long-lasting and effective! There is a scent, it's kind of an orange smell, I don't find it bad or overpowering and it tends to fade after a few minutes wearing it. Can take time to soak in so make sure if applying in the morning or if you're in a rush to use less or give it at least 20 mins before applying make up. Will definitely be repurchasing after I run out!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't get pass the smell of this product. It has a very strong unpleasant odour that I can't stand. I can't even verify if this product has a positive effect on the skin sadly. Will never buy again.

reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample and I'm surprisingly impressed. I apply a few drops on a freshly washed face in the morning. If you use too much it can take a really long tome to absorb, which is not ideal for a busy morning getting ready for work. But I have to say my skin has had a radiant glow to it. I noticed a difference after a few days.

reviews.review_title: Fell in love with this  u2763ufe0f
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a 15ml sample bottle. I only use 2 tiny drops on my face at night ( toner> vitamin C> moisturizer/rosehip seed oil). This product is amazzzingggg. This is my very first time using vitamin c serum and it actually works but expensive. My acne scars are slowly fading away. It smells like turmeric thats why people are complaining but I don't mind it because I do diy turmeric mask every other week.  The oil isn't greasy at all and it doesn't turn your skin yellow.  Its a little overpriced but I hope it goes on sale so I can buy the full size :( even 15 ml lasted lil over a month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It absorbs super quickly and it has definitely helped add a little bit of glow on all of my zoom calls. Also the packaging is beautifully designed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received as a sample and had to buy. My acne had almost fully cleared up and pores look amazing. Just waiting on my full size to arrive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and I thought I wouldn't like it as my face is oily in summer, but gets extremely dry that it peels off in winter, this saved my skin! Will definitely get full size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this oil! It smells like summer and feels incredible. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works excellent with my jade gua sha tool. It gives a healthy glow and perfect skin that lasts. My skin looks even, bright and glowing after use and the next day. I am a brown skinned girl, so finding skin care products that make my skin bright is so important to me. The downside of this product is that the scent is strong. I really hope the company changes their scent to make it lighter. It gives me an allergic feeling as I've sensitive to scents. I received this with a GWP promo through Sephora, and am considering purchasing it if the scent changes or I become accustomed to it with no allergic feeling when I use it in the night or the next day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't sure what to expect when I got this as a sample but I love trying out new stuff so I went for it.  I cannot explain why it did what it did but in one 5ml sample bottle that lasted about 2 weeks my skin is transformed.  My pores look smaller, I have no breakouts and my scarring from previous acne is definitely fading.  The description mentions nothing about pores so no idea how that happened but this has to be one of the best things I've used.  Dry skin is gone, oily skin isn't as oily.  I went back and got 5 more 100 point samples to be sure and in Bottle 3 now.  Still the same amazing results.  Will 100% buy full size.  I always thought an oil would be too heavy but this is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this face oil as a sample and immediately ordered the full size. I find that foundation tends to cling to my dry skin and settle into patches. I started applying this face oil before applying my foundation and it has been a game changer for me. My skin looks & feels way more hydrated & glowy. I have to admit that I was nervous to order the full size when I started reading reviews saying that it made some people break out, but that was not the case for me (and I have super sensitive skin)! The smell isn't great, but I don't find that it lingers. 10/10 recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a trial size, and was about to throw it away after trying for the first time mainly because of the smell. It's just not my personal smell preference.  However I was so surprised when I noticed my skin was so smooth in the morning. My skin is dead dry. I use tons of product but still wakes up my skin feeling so dry. It keeps my skin glowy and moisturized whole day. Holy! This is how ones skin should feel like! Just super glad discovered this one. Tbh I tried all the brands that promise super moisture from drunk elephant to sk-II. So far this is my to go. Now I'm purchasing the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a fine facial oil with some extra benefits, but I think if Vitamin C is a priority ingredient for you then there are better, more potent serums out there. I give it 2 stars because I find the scent weird and overwhelming. it smells exactly like walnut baklava.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this. I put it on at night, probably 3 times a week, and I wake up glowing. Have never gotten so many compliments on my skin. I have scars and pigmentation from acne, and I think this is helping reducing the appearance of that. Would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for my husband. He didn't think it helped much for him (olive skin, dark undereyes, wrinkles, no acne), also it made me break out every time so its not good for my acne prone skin in my opinion. It doesn't feel clean either because you have to keep opening the whole supply to the air and then dipping the dripper back in the liquid in the bottle to close the lid. I really would have preferred a closed pump bottle, I think that would have also it help preserve the active ingredients (vitamin c).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the glow this oil gives me. And I actually like the texture of it, which is pretty thick. But I do find it sinks into the skin fairly quickly. I really enjoy mixing it with my CEO serum. The only reason I am giving it four stars is because the smell is pretty strong, and almost too much. That I almost didn't even bother giving it a chance. But once I started mixing it in with the serum it helped tone the scent down a little, as the scent of the serum kind of offsets it and I enjoy the smell of that one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Great! But don't use with Retinol
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and LOVE IT! if you're new to using vitamin C, start by using it 3 times a week and work you're way up to daily. It tingles and if you're sensitive, that could be annoying.   This will lower the pH of your skin so consider that when using with other products.   Also, the post recommends using this with retinol. That makes no sense as retinol reduces the effectiveness of Vitamin C. So if you're a fan of retinol (I am!) use this in the morning, as it won't cause you're skin to be more sensitive to UV rays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a free gift at sephora. This oil gave my skin such an amazing glow within days of use. The packaging is cute and there is a little dropper you use to control how much oil you use. I literally just finished my bottle of Sunday Riley Hydroactive Cellular face oil and loved it but I think this one will be my staple, I'm enjoying the glow my skin has. I've seen people say it smells bad but I don't even notice that. I didn't break out and my skin was noticeably brighter.

reviews.review_title: Actual Magic for a Gal in Her Late 30s
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't typically write reviews but I need older people to know about this legit amazing potion. I'm 37 and have fine lines but otherwise pretty normal skin. I use this in the morning after a Korean essence then follow with Bobbi Brown Face Base and my skin looks g o r g e o u s. Smooth, perfectly glowy under minimal makeup, radiant, lovely.. I cannot get enough of my face right now. Like better skin than I had in my 20s. I too redeemed 100 points for a sample, used it three times then went for the full size later that week. I noticed a difference on day one and am so stoked to have found the perfect daytime Vit C product for me (and can stop spending money on other crap that doesn't work on my old face).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product for 100 points just to give it a try and ended up loving it. It has a nice natural scent. after using it my skin feels refreshed. I have acne prone skin and this does not cause me to breakout. love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using this product for a couple of weeks now and I can definitely see results. My skin looks clear and it is glowing!

reviews.review_text: The best skin care oil ever!! Within days my skin was smooth, bright, healthy  and glowing. Use it every night and sometimes in the day as well. Tried it by redeeming 100 points and then loved it so much, bought the large bottle.

reviews.review_title: might work for some but not me

I may have just had an allergic reaction to the product but I'm extremely disappointed and will not be repurchasing. I'm sticking with more natural skincare products from this point forward that don't have 100+ ingredients in them.

The third ingredient is a derivative of coconut oil, which clogs your pores. After about 4 days of use, I had breakouts all around my chin, and I very rarely get a breakout. Can't recommend, wish skincare companies would get off the coconut oil thing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this, it hydrates my skin and gives it a little glow. I have combo and sensitive skin and it did not irritate or made me break out. I would definitely recommend this, I will forever repurchase this!

I am sitting outside reading, applied the two drops of oil over a 1/2 hour ago and can smell it wafting with the breeze and while sitting with no breeze.  Yuck.  I am a scent junkie and this is not nice.  I think I am going to toss it!

reviews.review_title: So far, Loving it. Happy Skin

I'm not sure why everyone is complaining about the scent, I think it's so nice; it's tame and smells like jasmine tea of all things. Be glad that maybe it isn't full of all sorts of irritating fragrances! Anyway, my super sensitive skin seems to really like this - soaks in nicely, hydrates, nourishes, and I think even calms. Once my little sample vial is out, I'm gonna have a dilemma on my hands! To buy or not to buy? That is the question. Low-key probably will cuz it's wonderful.

I only use two drops on damn hands, and apply this at night. Wonderful product

I have combination skin more on the dry side. I apply this at night and it brightens my skin and creates a wonderful glow that gets even better in the morning. I always receive compliments on my skin when this is used. Make-up sinks into the skin like a dream. This is a great product to have as a ''pick-me-up'' when your skin is looking dull or dry. As it is expensive, I suggest buying the sample size - you'll use it for months to come if you love it and if it doesn't work for your skin only $10 spent!

reviews.review_text: Wow. Let me start be saying I've always been pretty hesitant to try any sort of oils on my face. I wear lash extensions so I just stay away from them in general. However, I did one of the oxygen facials and the person who was doing mine used this on me and just avoided the eye area. I've been using this consistently for just over a month now and my skin has never been better. My skin is glowing to the Gods, I get complimented on it all the time. I've also noticed quite a reduction in my hyper-pigmentation. My skin is also super hydrated. The scent isn't overwhelming, I actually quite like it but it's not for everyone. I use this first, then put a couple spritzes of my Caudalie beauty elixir and Fresh Glow Nectar and I'm set for the day. I honestly never wear makeup anymore because of this combination. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

reviews.review_title: Another beautiful face oil by Sunday Riley
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the third face oil I have tried from Sunday Riley, and I love it. Another great product. I normally use turmeric in my homemade mask to reduce inflammation and hyperpigmentation, and I like to incorporate vitamin C products to help protect my skin against UV damage. When I saw the ingredients and the claims I had to try it. And I am so glad I did.  I happen to have had a bad reaction to some skin product previously and broke out on one of my cheeks. My skin type normally gets brown spots for scars that seem to never disappear. The sale could not have come at a better time; the oil seems to have calmed my skin, and has reduced the appearance  of the spots.   I have only been using it for a couple of weeks now, twice a day, and my complexion is more clear, vibrant, and feels more hydrated. No bad skin reactions, and my spots have not disappeared entirely, but they seem lighter and my complexion seems a bit brighter; so I have hope. I use about 3-4 small drops for my entire face. I hope this will help me lighten my hyperpigmentation more with prolonged use.  This formula does not break me out, and it wears well under liquid foundation. I have tried about three different foundations and all have worked well together. It does not pill, or change the shade of my foundation. I put my sunscreen on top of this before my foundation. Everything works beautifully together.  I would highly recommend this face oil. I have combination oily skin, that is aging and has hyperpigmentation. I get hormonal breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I got this oil as a tiny sample about 2 weeks ago from Sephora. My biggest skin problems are that my skin stays pretty clear, but if I get one small problem area it spreads everywhere and then takes at least 2 weeks to calm down. Then after the acne is gone, the scars take weeks to go away and usually almost gone but then the next outbreak starts. I've been using my Avene Recovery Cream (from the pharmacy) and this oil together for the past 2 weeks and it's really helping with the scars. They don't look as dark as they normally do (especially the ones on my cheeks which are the worst). The scars are usually black and difficult to conceal, but they've become a brown that just a few shades darker than my skin tone now. With concealer now, they're almost invisible.   I'm excited to try a larger size. I use it mostly at night after washing my face with Aveeno sensitive skin face wash and then I add a thin layer of that recovery cream for added hydration. I sometimes just have the oil on a bare face if I'm just at home and it doesn't make it super oily, but I recommend only 2 drops for the entire face.   I have combination skin, my t zone is oily, my cheeks and jawline can become dry and start to crack after using acne-related products.   Will give it 5 out 5 once I try the larger size for more than 2 weeks! Hope the review helps!

reviews.review_text: Hands down the best thing I have ever purchased. This has literally saved my skin. I have combination skin and I'm very prone to breakouts. I use this morning and night. A little goes a long way. I haven't had a break out since I starting using this 5 months ago. My skin is dewy and discolouration has almost disappeared.

I just love the scent. It is fresh, herbaceous and almost like just cut grass. Really lovely.  It seems to have slightly reduced any pigmentation and I'm sure will continue to do so over time.  My skin feels so smooth and not greasy with this oil.  I am so glad I purchased it, and am sure it will become a favourite.

reviews.review_title: NATURAL GLOW FOR ACNE PRONE SKIN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am generally a fan of Sunday Riley products although there are some that don't work for my skin type. Unlike some other reviews, I happen to really enjoy the natural smell of this oil and admire that it isn't full of added fragrance like other skincare products. I noticed glowing results within the first week and love how well this product keeps my acne under control. Turmeric is an anti-inflammatory ingredient and makes my acne prone skin look hydrated and glowing. My cystic acne looks less red and less irritated which is usually really difficult to achieve. I have been using this oil in the evening with a jade roller to really help it absorb and in the morning I will put a couple drops on underneath my makeup. It's not always easy to trust reviews and not every product is going to be holy grail status for all skin types but if you have combination or acne prone skin I highly recommend trying this product. If you are having any doubts I would suggest buying the smaller size- it's cheaper, more travel friendly, and you don't have to worry about ingredients going bad over time like you do with the larger size!
